definitions.example: Abducting children is bad for mothers.
Do you think it is a bad idea to confront him directly?
It is bad manners to talk with your mouth full.

definitions.definition: Unhealthy; liable to cause health problems.
definitions.example: Lard is bad for you. Smoking is bad for you, too. Grapes are bad for dogs but not for humans.
I went to the hospital to see how my grandfather was doing. Unfortunately, he's in a bad state.

definitions.definition: Not behaving; behaving badly; misbehaving; mischievous or disobedient.
definitions.example: Stop being bad, or you will get a spanking!
Divorce is usually a bad experience for everybody involved.
Be careful. There are bad people in the world.
I had a bad headlight.
These apples have gone bad.
Bad breath is not pleasant for anyone.
They were caught trying to pass bad coinage.

definitions.definition: Unskilled; of limited ability; not good.
definitions.example: He's a bad gardener; everything he tries to grow ends up dying.
I don't look bad in this dress, do I?
Man, that new car you bought is bad!

definitions.definition: (of a need, want, or pain) Severe, urgent.
definitions.example: He is in bad need of a haircut.

definitions.definition: (of a draft/check) Not covered by funds on account.
definitions.example: He gave me a bad check.

definitions.definition: Indicative of unkind or malevolent intentions; harsh, cruel.
definitions.example: He suffered from ill treatment.

definitions.definition: Unpropitious, unkind, faulty, not up to reasonable standard.
definitions.example: ill manners; ill will

definitions.definition: Unwell in terms of health or physical condition; sick.
definitions.example: I've been ill with the flu for the past few days.
Seeing those pictures made me ill.

definitions.definition: (hip-hop slang) Sublime, with the connotation of being so in a singularly creative way.
Extremely bad (bad enough to make one ill). Generally used indirectly with to be.
definitions.example: That band was ill.

definitions.definition: Something or someone that is the worst
To outdo or defeat, especially in battle.

definitions.example: My sore leg hurts worst when it's cold and rainy.
